text:
Fritz Egner (born 3 August 1949) is a German radio presenter. He was born in Munich, Germany. In 1978 Egner joined the regional broadcaster Bayerischer Rundfunk. At this time his two friends and colleagues Thomas Gottschalk and Günther Jauch also joined.
Since 2016 he hosts the radio shows "Fritz und Hits" and "Stars und Hits" for Bayern 3, in addition he also hosts the Christmas radio show "Christmas Hits mit Fritz".
